Articles.Content:
Hey! I've just bought KSP I heard it's a great game!

I've been playing around with the demo (It's my favorite things to do!)

But I've boughten the full game and I've played around with it and it will be the main one i'll be playing. I just like the demo it's a lot of fun! (So is the full version, BUT YOU GET IT )

Hello and welcome aboard!

Yay, and say goodbye to sleep and social life. :3

Happy launching!
Greetings! May your rockets be stable and kerbals happy!
Hello and welcome to the forums! If you want your save from the demo you can copy it to the full version I believe.

Hello and welcome to the forums! If you want your save from the demo you can copy it to the full version I believe.

Ships constructed in your demo will work in 0.23.5. Just tested the Mun ship from the demo with only solar panels added. The SAS needed in the demo is unnecessary as that function is built into the pod.
